args.content:
import Mathlib

open BigOperators

variable {n : ‚Ñï} (b : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)

/-- The linear map given by dotting with b. -/
def dot_linear_map : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí‚Çó[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù :=
  { toFun := fun x => ‚àë i : Fin n, b i * x i,
    map_add := by
      intros x y
      -- sum distributes over addition
      simp [Pi.add_apply];
      -- use Finset.sum_add_distrib
      admit,
    map_smul := by
      intros c x
      simp [Pi.smul_apply];
      -- pull scalar out of sum
      admit }

/-- The corresponding continuous linear map. -/
def dot_continuous_linear_map : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù :=
  ContinuousLinearMap.mk dot_linear_map (by continuity)

/-- The operator norm of the dot product map equals the Euclidean norm of b. -/
theorem opNorm_dot_eq_norm : ‚Äñdot_continuous_linear_map b‚Äñ = ‚Äñ(b : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚Äñ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open BigOperators

variable {n : ‚Ñï} (b : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)

/-- The linear map given by dotting with b. -/
def dot_linear_map : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí‚Çó[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù :=
  { toFun := fun x => ‚àë i : Fin n, b i * x i,
    map_add' := by
      intros x y
      simp [Pi.add_apply]
      -- distributivity of sum over addition
      simp [Finset.sum_add_distrib],
    map_smul' := by
      intros c x
      simp [Pi.smul_apply]
      -- pull scalar out of sum
      have : ‚àÄ i, b i * (c * x i) = c * (b i * x i) := by intro i; ring
      simp [this] }

/-- The corresponding continuous linear map. -/
def dot_continuous_linear_map : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù :=
  ContinuousLinearMap.mk (dot_linear_map (b := b)) (by continuity)

/-- The operator norm of the dot product map equals the Euclidean norm of b. -/
theorem opNorm_dot_eq_norm : ‚Äñdot_continuous_linear_map (b := b)‚Äñ = ‚Äñ(b : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚Äñ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open BigOperators

variable {n : ‚Ñï} (b : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)

/-- The linear map given by dotting with b. -/
def dot_linear_map : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí‚Çó[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù :=
  { toFun := fun x => ‚àë i : Fin n, b i * x i,
    map_add' := by
      intros x y
      exact (by sorry : _),
    map_smul' := by
      intros c x
      exact (by sorry : _) }

/-- The corresponding continuous linear map. -/
def dot_continuous_linear_map : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù :=
  ContinuousLinearMap.mk (dot_linear_map (b := b)) (by sorry)

/-- The operator norm of the dot product map equals the Euclidean norm of b. -/
theorem opNorm_dot_eq_norm : ‚Äñdot_continuous_linear_map (b := b)‚Äñ = ‚Äñ(b : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚Äñ := by sorry
